creditline: Gift of Chichi Steiner and Tom Rassieur in memory of Jeanne Rassieur Casey
description: clear glass; tumbler form on wide, flat foot; body flared slightly outward from base; spiraling rings of glass around body from bottom to approx. 2-1/2" from top, beginning at bottom as wider strip with fluting and tapering to thinner strip without fluting at top
title: Bandwurmglas
